lead_paragraph: The woman who was allegedly assaulted by Pittsburgh Steelers wide receiver Santonio Holmes has asked that charges against him be dropped, his attorney said yesterday. Holmes was arrested June 19 and charged with misdemeanor domestic violence and simple assault. The woman accused Holmes of choking her, throwing her to the ground, grabbing her arms and slamming her into a door, according to a statement to the police in Columbus, Ohio.
